title: Date, year, week conversion
text: default functions returns isoyear isoweek today.
code: date_to_isoyear_c() #> [1] "2022" date_to_isoyear_n() #> [1] 2022 date_to_isoweek_c() #> [1] "16" date_to_isoweek_n() #> [1] 16 # provide a date date_to_isoyear_c('2021-01-01') #> [1] "2020" date_to_isoyear_n('2021-01-01') #> [1] 2020 date_to_isoweek_c('2021-01-01') #> [1] "53" date_to_isoweek_n('2021-01-01') #> [1] 53 date_to_isoyearweek_c('2021-08-11') #> [1] "2021-32"

what: Get year/week from a isoyearweek string
title: Date, year, week conversion

text: package proudly brought : Chi Zhang. Author, maintainer. Richard Aubrey White. Author. . Copyright holder. See changelog contributors. ðŸ™

title: Authors and Citation
text: Zhang C, White RA (2022). spltime: Date time functions public health purposes. R package version 2022.4.21.
code: @Manual{,   title = {spltime: Date and time functions for public health purposes},   author = {Chi Zhang and Richard Aubrey White},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 2022.4.21}, }

title: Date and time functions for public health purposes
text: spltime provides date time functions public health purposes. spltime provides convenient consistent conversion isoyear isoweek calyear season week addition, fhitime provides calendar data reference. Read introduction vignette run help(package="spltime").

title: Date and time functions for public health purposes
text: splverse set R packages developed help solve problems frequently occur performing infectious disease surveillance. want install dev versions (access packages havenâ€™t released CRAN), run usethis::edit_r_profile() edit .Rprofile. write : Save file restart R. can now install splverse packages drat repository.
code: options(   repos = structure(c(     SPLVERSE  = "https://docs.sykdomspulsen.no/drat/",     CRAN      = "https://cran.rstudio.com"   )) ) install.packages("spltime")

Norwegian workdays and holidays by date â€” norway_workdays_by_date
text: date Date. day_of_week Integer. 1 = Monday, 7 = Sunday mon_to_fri Integer. 1 Monday Friday, 0 Saturday Sunday sat_to_sun Integer. 1 Saturday Sunday, 0 Monday Friday public_holiday Integer. 1 public holiday (helligdag), 0 public holiday freeday Integer. 1 public holiday (helligdag) sat_to_sun==1, 0 otherwise workday Integer. 1 freeday==0, 0 freeday==1
